app_description.message: Collects browsing data to analyze your habbits and filter bad content

pageblocked_content.message: Access to this page has been blocked.

pageblocked_suffix.message: has been blocked because it was not previously recorded.

option_mode_help.message:
Operation Mode of SurfAlyze

Learning mode: SurfAlyze will record your surfing habbits. It won't block any pages it doesn't know though.

Warning: SurfAlyze will still record pages you visit, but it will issue a warning for unknown pages.

Armed: You will only be able to open pages SurfAlyze has recorded before.

option_blockmainframes_help.message:
Block Pages

Blocks loading of entire pages if they're unknown.

Only relevant for Armed Mode.

option_sbakey_help.message:
Safe Browsing API Key

Personal API Key to the Google Safe Browsing API.

You can register your own key here: https://developers.google.com/safe-browsing/key_signup


(Advisory provided by Google, see: https://developers.google.com/safe-browsing/safebrowsing_faq)

option_advanced_help.message:
Advanced Content Settings

If enabled, you will be able to select advanced content tracking options for SurfAlyze.

option_request_iframes_help.message:
IFrames

If disabled, all types of frames will not be tracked.

option_request_scripts_help.message:
Scripts

If disabled, script files will not be tracked.

option_request_ajax_help.message:
AJAX

If disabled, AJAX-requests (XHR, XMLHttpRequest) will not be tracked.

option_request_other_help.message:
Other

If disabled, requests to resources not within one of the above categories will be tracked.

infobar_unknown_title.message: Content on this page is unknown

infobar_blocked_title.message: Content on this page has been blocked

whitelistinfo.message:
Entries in the whitelist are used as part of a regulary expression to match subdomains and possible TLDs.
(e.g. /(^\S+\.|^)ajax.googleapis\.\w+$/i)
